text:
February
Third
1940
Mr. M. 3. Novik
Radio Station WXNC
Munlolpal Broadcasting System
New York Gity
Dear Novik:
Thanks for your note on frequency modulation
hearing. Mr, Brimberg, notwithstanding, I
think frequency modulation is coming fast.
We hope to be in the field soon.
Cordially yours,
FE3/rep
Frank 5. Sohooley
